md:
giải nghĩa từ "skeptic" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Skeptic (noun) - người hoài nghi, người nghi ngờ
	+ Example: "He's a skeptic when it comes to new technology."
	+ Related words: skepticism (n), skeptical (adj)

* Skeptic (verb) - nghi ngờ, hoài nghi
	+ Example: "I tend to skeptic the claims of that company."
	+ Related words: skepticism (n), skeptical (adj)

Note: In English, "skeptic" can be used as both a noun and a verb. As a noun, it refers to a person who is skeptical or doubtful. As a verb, it means to doubt or question something.

  • Skeptic (noun) - người hoài nghi, người nghi ngờ

  • Skeptic (verb) - nghi ngờ, hoài nghi

    • Example: "I tend to skeptic the claims of that company."

Note: In English, "skeptic" can be used as both a noun and a verb. As a noun, it refers to a person who is skeptical or doubtful. As a verb, it means to doubt or question something.
